channel.title: 317 god i need help
channel.description: okay so like when i log on instantly i get dc and then every 20 - 50 seconds i get disconnected idk what it is its really annoying is there some bug or is it in server for it saying dc after you do not hit something for so long an its just glitching out. adk please someone help thanks.

It’s called the idle timer, and this can be removed…
